Recent Work

These are just smaller sets or work I've done in the past year or two.

About the Project

Here are three sets of work plus a group where I don't think there's enough work to say they are related. It's just added as uncategorized. The others are building/architecture, vintage stuff like signs and other things, and the human form. In short, my work has been all over the place thematically.
